EmailTemplate.name: FlightPlan_Online_Event_for_Airlines_by_Inmarsat_and_APEX.Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Survey: Feedback on FlightPlan
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> ${headertext} FlightPlan was a full-day online broadcast event that took place on April 29th. It brought together aviation leaders, global airlines, industry analysts, commentators as well as over 3,000 live viewers from over 100 countries.
Inmarsat and APEX would appreciate your feedback on the event, so that it could be improved in the next edition. ${ctaLinkText} <[[${ctaLink}]]> THE POWER OF FREE Wi-Fi
John Peterson, Vice President Services and Connectivity, participated in the Wi-Fi debate. John stressed that connectivity is a driver for operational efficiencies and lower costs as well as revenue opportunities from improving the passenger experience.
View Video (4:55) <[[https://flightplan.wavecast.io/the-power-of-free-john-peterson-vp-service-and-connectivity-honeywell-aerospace]]> | Tell us what you think <[[mailto:krasimir.koychev@honeywell.com?subject=Free Wi-Fi Feedback]]> THE POWER OF DATA
Josh Melin, Honeywell Forge ATR Leader, talked about "Data as the Red Thread of Digitalization." Josh focused on how flight data drives insights and how these insights can help airlines improve operations and the customer experience.
View Video (5:36) <[[https://flightplan.wavecast.io/the-power-of-data-josh-melin-director-honeywell-forge-honeywell-aerospace]]> | Tell us what you think <[[mailto:krasimir.koychev@honeywell.com?subject=Data Feedback]]>
